transportAdvice: Munich has an excellent integrated public transit network including metro (U-Bahn), suburban rail (S-Bahn), trams, and buses that cover all major tourist areas efficiently. The city centre is highly walkable, and taxis are widely available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold winter month with frequent frost, occasional snow, and short daylight hours.
Still cold and wintry with possible snow, though days begin to lengthen slightly.
Early spring brings milder temperatures but changeable weather with rain and occasional late snow.
Spring arrives with warming temperatures, blooming parks, and a mix of sunny and showery days.
Pleasant and green with warm days, though May is one of the rainier months with frequent showers.
Warm early summer with long days, outdoor beer garden season in full swing, and occasional thunderstorms.
The warmest month, ideal for outdoor activities, though afternoon thunderstorms are common.
Warm and lively with late-summer festivals; thunderstorms remain frequent in the afternoons.
Oktoberfest season brings pleasant autumn warmth with cooling evenings and moderate rainfall.
Autumn colours emerge as temperatures drop noticeably and misty mornings become more common.
Grey and cool with frequent overcast skies, fog, and the first hints of winter chill.
Cold and festive with famous Christmas markets, possible snow, and short daylight hours.
